description: For maximum performance: the Eisfeld Advanced SO Pants Men from the Eiger Extreme Collection. Robust, highly elastic soft shell double fabric for optimal freedom of movement, breathability and abrasion resistance. The pants are climbing harness-compatible and have an integrated mesh cellphone pocket in the leg pocket. Additional features such as the various pockets add the finishing touches to the design.
name: Mammut Eisfeld Advanced SO Pants, Short - Mens
